short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explains concepts and solves doubts based on a given set of notes. This is optimised for the CAIE Syllabus (IGCSE, AS/A Levels)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use StudyPal: Study smarter, not harder. 

It uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) to explains concepts and solves doubts based on a given set of notes. 

Just open the webpage that has the notes for your syllabus. Then go to the extension and ask it to read the page. Once done, you will be able to ask questions to it which can help you to solve doubts and improve clarity.

Additional Features:
(you can access these by selecting the text and right clicking)
- Save your valuable time by using the summarise feature on large parts of the notes.
- Get instant explanations on confusing concepts
- Make questions on the selected content to test your understanding.

This is specially optimised for the CAIE Syllabus (IGCSE, AS/A Levels)
